heroSections.title: Hand-crafted timber windows & doors for character homes
heroSections.subtitle: Wealden Joinery designs and builds bespoke oak and Accoya joinery from our Rotherfield workshop, blending period details with modern performance.

productCategories.title: Sash & casement windows
productCategories.description: Slim sightlines, secure locking, and discreet draught-proofing that respects the original architecture.
bullets: Bespoke profiles to match period details

productCategories.title: Entrance, French & bifold doors
productCategories.description: Solid timber doors with crisp joinery, warm-edge glazing, and smooth operation built to handle daily use.

productCategories.title: Bespoke joinery & restoration
productCategories.description: Made-to-measure cabinetry, stair details, and sympathetic replacements for listed buildings across East Sussex and Kent.

caseStudies.title: Rotherfield farmhouse upgrade
caseStudies.summary: New Accoya sash windows with slim glazing bars improved comfort while preserving the cottage character.

caseStudies.title: Tunbridge Wells townhouse
caseStudies.summary: Hand-finished French doors and sidelights brought more light into a Georgian kitchen extension.

aboutSections.heading: Crafted in Rotherfield
aboutSections.body: Our team machines, assembles, and finishes every project in-house, combining traditional techniques with precision tooling.
points: Friendly team available by phone or workshop visit

aboutSections.heading: Why homeowners choose Wealden
aboutSections.body: From survey to installation we keep communication clear, share technical drawings for approval, and schedule works around your build.

galleryImages.alt: Workshop joinery components ready for finishing

contactSections.heading: Ready to plan your project?
contactSections.body: Share your drawings or tell us about your property and we'll prepare a clear, itemised quotation.
contactSections.address: Unit 1, London Road, Rotherfield, East Sussex
